title: Did Congress Celebrate Win By Blackening PM Modi’s Hoarding? Nope
subtitle: The post is captioned - ‘This is how BJP behaves in a loss ; This is how Congress behaves in a win’, purportedly attempting to show the ‘difference’ between the two parties.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
It's been a week since the Congress came into power in three states, and fake news factories have been in an overdrive since.

The latest to join this bandwagon is a post which shows outgoing Chief Ministers Shivraj Singh Chouhan and Vasundhara Raje with the new CMs Kamal Nath and Ashok Gehlot respectively and a Congress worker blackening the face of PM Modi on a poster.

The post is captioned 'This is how BJP behaves in a loss; This is how Congress behaves in a win', purportedly attempting to show the 'difference' between the two parties.
